trans-unit.source: -F
.format()
A tool to create character sheets for Dungeons and Dragons.
trans-unit.target: 为《龙与地下城》制作角色表的工具。

trans-unit.source: Content Descriptions

Different linux distributions have different names for packages. While pdftk is available in Debian and derivatives as pdftk, the package is not available in some RPM distributions, such as Fedora and CentOS. One alternative would be to build your PC sheets using docker.
trans-unit.target: 不同的Linux发行版对软件包使用不同的名称。虽然PDFTK是在Debian和衍生物可作为PDFTK，包是不是在一些RPM分发，比如Fedora和CentOS可用。一种选择是使用docker构建您的PC工作表。

trans-unit.source: Dungeon sheets requires at least python 3.6. This is mostly due to the liberal use of f-strings. If you want to use it with previous versions of python 3, you’ll probably have to replace all the f-strings with the older
trans-unit.target: 地牢工作表至少需要python 3.6。这主要是由于自由使用f字符串。如果要在python 3的早期版本中使用它，则可能必须将所有f字符串替换为较旧的

trans-unit.source: Dungeons and Dragons 5e Character Tools
Each character is described by a python file, which gives many attributes associated with the character. See examples for more information about the character descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 每个字符都由一个python文件描述，该文件提供了与该字符相关的许多属性。有关字符描述的更多信息，请参见示例。

trans-unit.source: If pdftk is available, it will be used for pdf generation. If not, a fallback python library (pdfrw) will be used. This has some limitations:
trans-unit.target: 如果pdftk可用，它将用于pdf生成。否则，将使用后备python库（pdfrw）。这有一些限制：

trans-unit.source: If the
If you have the excellent dndbook LaTeX template, consider using the
trans-unit.target: 如果您拥有出色的dndbook LaTeX模板，请考虑使用

trans-unit.source: If you’d like a step-by-step walkthrough for creating a new character, just run
trans-unit.target: 如果您想逐步了解如何创建新角色，只需运行

trans-unit.source: Installation
Not able to flatten PDF forms
Note
Optional External dependencies
Produces v1.3 PDF files
The PDF’s can then be generated using the

The descriptions of content elements (e.g. classes, spells, etc.) are included in docstrings. The descriptions should ideally conform to reStructured text. This allows certain formatting elements to be properly parsed and rendered into LaTeX:
trans-unit.target: 内容元素(如类、咒语等)的描述包含在 docstrings 中。这些描述最好符合重构文本的要求。这允许某些格式化元素被正确地解析并渲染成LaTeX。

trans-unit.source: Usage
Will produce separate character-sheets, spell-lists and spell-books.
trans-unit.target: 将制作单独的字符表、咒语表和咒语书。

trans-unit.source: You may use pdftk to generate the sheets in PDF format.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用pdftk生成PDF格式的图纸。

trans-unit.source: You will need pdflatex installed to generate the PDF spell pages (optional).
trans-unit.target: 您将需要安装pdflatex来生成PDF拼写页面（可选）。

trans-unit.source: command is available on your system, spellcasters will include a spellbook with descriptions of each spell known. If not, then this feature will be skipped.
trans-unit.target: 命令在你的系统上是可用的,施法者会在咒语书中附上每个已知咒语的描述。如果没有,那么这个功能将被跳过。

trans-unit.source: command.
create-character
dungeon-sheets contains definitions for standard weapons and spells, so attack bonuses and damage can be calculated automatically.
trans-unit.target: dungeon-sheets包含了标准武器和法术的定义,所以攻击奖励和伤害可以自动计算。

trans-unit.source: from a command line and a helpful menu system will take care of the basics for you.
trans-unit.target: 而一个有用的菜单系统将为您提供基本的服务。

trans-unit.target: 包括此模板的选项以呈现法术书，德鲁伊荒野表单和功能页面：https : //github.com/rpgtex/DND-5e-LaTeX-Template
